name: Wingate by Wyndham Bridgeport

reviews.title: Great time at the Wingate Hotel in Bridgeport, West Virginia
reviews.text: My husband, infant son and I stayed at the Wingate Hotel from May 31st through June 3rd. The hotel is great for business travelers and families. The rooms are clean and spacious; the hotel staff friendly and professional; and the breakfast buffet has a good variety of foods and lasts from 6am-10am everyday. The hotel is within 5 minutes of a large variety of shopping centers and the scenery in this area is absolutely breathtaking. We would definitely stay at this hotel again.

reviews.title: Very nice hotel
reviews.text: New hotel on a hilltop in an area being developed. Right off the expressway. Two to three exits away from huge shopping plazas (Walmart, Krogers, restaurants galore, Target, etc.).
Impressed with the frig and microwave and cleanliness.
reviews.title: Nice, somewhat secluded

aka: Wingate By Wyndham Bridgeport Hotel Bridgeport
